verses.verse: Now these are the names <WH8034> of the children <WH1121> of Israel <WH3478>, which came <WH935> into Egypt <WH4714>; every man <WH376> and his household <WH1004> came <WH935> with Jacob <WH3290>.
Reuben <WH7205>, Simeon <WH8095>, Levi <WH3878>, and Judah <WH3063>,
Issachar <WH3485>, Zebulun <WH2074>, and Benjamin <WH1144>,
Dan <WH1835>, and Naphtali <WH5321>, Gad <WH1410>, and Asher <WH836>.
And all the souls <WH5315> that came out <WH3318> of the loins <WH3409> of Jacob <WH3290> were seventy <WH7657> souls <WH5315>: for Joseph <WH3130> was in Egypt <WH4714> already.
And Joseph <WH3130> died <WH4191>, and all his brethren <WH251>, and all that generation <WH1755>.

¶ And the children <WH1121> of Israel <WH3478> were fruitful <WH6509>, and increased abundantly <WH8317>, and multiplied <WH7235>, and waxed exceeding <WH3966> <WH3966> mighty <WH6105>; and the land <WH776> was filled <WH4390> with them.
Now there arose up <WH6965> a new <WH2319> king <WH4428> over Egypt <WH4714>, which knew <WH3045> not Joseph <WH3130>.
And he said <WH559> unto his people <WH5971>, Behold, the people <WH5971> of the children <WH1121> of Israel <WH3478> are more <WH7227> and mightier <WH6099> than we:

Come on <WH3051>, let us deal wisely <WH2449> with them; lest they multiply <WH7235>, and it come to pass, that, when there falleth out <WH7122> any war <WH4421>, they <WH1931> join <WH3254> also unto our enemies <WH8130>, and fight <WH3898> against us, and so get them up <WH5927> out of the land <WH776>.

Therefore they did set <WH7760> over them taskmasters <WH4522> <WH8269> to afflict <WH6031> them with their burdens <WH5450>. And they built <WH1129> for Pharaoh <WH6547> treasure <WH4543> cities <WH5892>, Pithom <WH6619> and Raamses <WH7486>.
But the more they afflicted <WH6031> them, the more <WH3651> they multiplied <WH7235> and grew <WH6555>. And they were grieved <WH6973> because <WH6440> of the children <WH1121> of Israel <WH3478>.
And the Egyptians <WH4714> made <WH5647> the children <WH1121> of Israel <WH3478> to serve <WH5647> with rigour <WH6531>:

And they made <WH4843> their lives <WH2416> bitter <WH4843> with hard <WH7186> bondage <WH5656>, in morter <WH2563>, and in brick <WH3843>, and in all manner of service <WH5656> in the field <WH7704>: all their service <WH5656>, wherein they made them serve <WH5647>, was with rigour <WH6531>.

¶ And the king <WH4428> of Egypt <WH4714> spake <WH559> to the Hebrew <WH5680> midwives <WH3205>, of which the name <WH8034> of the one <WH259> was Shiphrah <WH8236>, and the name <WH8034> of the other <WH8145> Puah <WH6326>:

And he said <WH559>, When ye do the office of a midwife <WH3205> to the Hebrew women <WH5680>, and see <WH7200> them upon the stools <WH70>; if it be a son <WH1121>, then ye shall kill <WH4191> him: but if it be a daughter <WH1323>, then she shall live <WH2425>.

But the midwives <WH3205> feared <WH3372> God <WH430>, and did <WH6213> not as the king <WH4428> of Egypt <WH4714> commanded <WH1696> them, but saved <WH2421> the men children <WH3206> alive <WH2421>.

And the king <WH4428> of Egypt <WH4714> called <WH7121> for the midwives <WH3205>, and said <WH559> unto them, Why <WH4069> have ye done <WH6213> this thing <WH1697>, and have saved <WH2421> the men children <WH3206> alive <WH2421>?

And the midwives <WH3205> said <WH559> unto Pharaoh <WH6547>, Because the Hebrew <WH5680> women <WH802> are not as the Egyptian women <WH4713>; for they are lively <WH2422>, and are delivered <WH3205> ere <WH2962> the midwives <WH3205> come in <WH935> unto them.
Therefore God <WH430> dealt well <WH3190> with the midwives <WH3205>: and the people <WH5971> multiplied <WH7235>, and waxed very <WH3966> mighty <WH6105>.
And it came to pass, because the midwives <WH3205> feared <WH3372> God <WH430>, that he made <WH6213> them houses <WH1004>.

And Pharaoh <WH6547> charged <WH6680> all his people <WH5971>, saying <WH559>, Every son <WH1121> that is born <WH3209> ye shall cast <WH7993> into the river <WH2975>, and every daughter <WH1323> ye shall save alive <WH2421>.
